# owningView

**Instance Property**

The view that owns this layout guide.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var owningView: NSView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property is `nil`.  To participate in Auto Layout, the layout guide must be added to a view by calling its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/addLayoutGuide(_:)] method. Do not modify this property directly. Instead, use the view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/addLayoutGuide(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/removeLayoutGuide(_:)] methods, which update this property as necessary.

## Working With Layout Guides

- **identifier**: A string used to identify the layout guide.
- **frame**: The layout guide’s frame in its owning view’s coordinate system.
